itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson, Mat Best, and Dan Hollaway discuss Conor McGregor's dominant return to the UFC and what's next for him and possibly the sport of boxing along with a quick preview of the Kansas City Chiefs Vs San Francisco 49ers Super Bowl matchup and wha...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson, Mat Best, and Dan Hollaway discuss Conor McGregor's dominant return to the UFC and what's next for him and possibly the sport of boxing along with a quick preview of the Kansas City Chiefs Vs San Francisco 49ers Super Bowl matchup and what it will mean to see the best offense vs the best defense.
